meanings.definition: A type of marine gastropod mollusk with a gill that is located in front of the heart.
meanings.sent1: The prosobranchs in the ocean have gills near their hearts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study prosobranchs to learn about their unique gill placement.
meanings.sent3: The prosobranchs had a party near their heart-shaped gills.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny underwater detectives, prosobranchs keep their gills close to their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The prosobranchs' gills, like tiny fans, flutter near their hearts.

meanings.definition: A group of marine snails that have a single gill and a shell that is typically coiled.
meanings.sent1: The prosobranchs with coiled shells swim gracefully in the sea.
meanings.sent2: Tourists love collecting colorful prosobranchs with their unique shells.
meanings.sent3: The prosobranchs decided to have a race to see whose shell was the most coiled.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marine snails, prosobranchs with coiled shells are like elegant dancers.
meanings.sent5: Children on the beach search for prosobranchs with their beautiful coiled shells.
